Phobias babies relay the news about the ship,"A war ship that size 
could only be meant for one purpose. The Tripredicus council has 
ordered an attack on this planet." 

Phobia realized the problem with this scenario, the temporal wave 
that destroyed his old ship, the one that he traced to this planet 
almost destroyed cybertron, Imagine the damage the destruction of 
this planet would cause. He had no choice, he had to do something. He 
had only one logical course of action.

"Pantron, open communications to the Maximals!!!"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Dachande85@a... wrote:
> (OOC: Sorry can't remember it's name, and I've deleted my mail 
recently)
> 
> ::Magmatron::
> 
>     "Alert Commander Magmatron," The ships computer voice said. "A 
ship has 
> been discovered in the oceans. It has transwarp capabilities."
>     Magmatron took this news in stride, this could be very good for 
him. "If 
> the Destrocons do not wish to join me then I will return to my 
plans. All 
> door open. Close main doors and autoguns online"
>     Everything happened as it should. Magmatron went back to his 
command 
> room. He sat looking at the blip on the radar screen. "Send a 
probe." He 
> commanded the ship. From the entrance the small probe went in 
search of the 
> ship, as it came near the cameras turned on.
>     "Well, what have we here? An attack would be pointless against 
a ship 
> that large, but if I can get inside....Maybe I'll equip Mantella 
and Shredder 
> with cloaking devices, and let them have some extras, just in case. 
Yes, that 
> would work."
> 
> 
> Somewhat on topic: Magmatron has a plan for the ship. Wondering 
what it is? 
> Stay tuned, same bat time, same bat channel.
